name: @vechain/sdk-network
description: This module serves as the standard interface connecting decentralized applications (dApps) and users to the VeChainThor blockchain
author: VeChain Foundation

scripts.check:circular-dependencies: npx madge --json --circular --extensions ts src | jq '. | length' | awk '{if($1 > 15) exit 1}'
scripts.test:integration:solo: (APPLYCODECOVLIMITS=false yarn stop-thor-solo && yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test:integration && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
scripts.test:solo:no-trace: yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test:no-trace && (yarn stop-thor-solo || true)
scripts.test:solo: (yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
scripts.test:solo:reduced-output: (yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test:reduced-output && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
scripts.test:solo:galactica: (yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test:galactica && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
scripts.test:browser:solo: (yarn start-thor-solo && yarn seed-thor-solo && yarn test:browser && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
